title: Luxury Living in the center of Silicon Valley
posting_body: Centrally located in the heart of Silicon Valley and near the Lawrence Caltrain Station, this luxury pool facing condo is offering convenience and resort-style living!
The charming open concept kitchen includes a large island leading into the dining, great room and a stunning covered patio.
Beautiful master suite highlighted by generous walk-in closet, spa-like master bath w/dual-sink vanity, large luxe shower.
Ample second bedroom features dual closets & private bath.
Additional features: spacious open office, powder room, in-unit laundry, assigned parking, and large windows overlooking resort.

Offering an unparalleled living experience w/a luxury resort-style community featuring exclusive access to third-story pool, hot tub, cabanas, spa, fitness ctr, barbecue areas, club room w/prep kitchen, sky lounge, access to amenities (24,000 sq ft retail), outdoor theater, basketball/sports courts, picnic tables, and parks etc.
Security deposit is additional one month rent.
